posts.title: Backyard Theater System
posts.content: Stop wasting your money at the overpriced theaters – now you can waste your money on this overpriced backyard theater system and keep your neighbors entertained all the while! This massive 16′ x 9′ theater system is perfect for block parties and concerts.

posts.title: Floating Putting Green
posts.content: Turn your pool into a challenging mini-golf hole with the floating putting green. You’ll be able to improve your handicap by placing a higher level of difficulty to your training through the floating island – a moving target that offers you a different shot every time.

posts.title: Shark Pet Bed
posts.content: Let your small dog or cat sleep in the belly of the beast with these self cleaning shark pet beds. Using nanotechnology, these cool shark beds will absorb pet odors and bacteria and are easily cleaned with the fabric lining that unzips for a quick wash.

posts.title: Double Rainbow Maker
posts.content: Fill your room up with brilliant colors with the flick of a switch using the double rainbow maker. Once the sun energizes the solar panel, the unit begins to spin around while the two Swarovski crystals maximize  the colors for an incredible effect that’ll brighten any room.

posts.title: Light Up Chess Set
posts.content: Now you can play a classic strategy game in a brand new light with the light up chess set. This high tech chess board features a sleek black playing surface and specially designed translucent game pieces that light up when placed on top of the board.

posts.title: Reshapable Custom Fit Earphones
posts.content: Avoid having your headphones slip off in the middle of your favorite song by upgrading to these reshapable custom fit earphones. These reasonably priced earphones offer great sound and can be shaped to the contours of your ear for the perfect fit.

posts.title: Glasses Grip Wax
posts.content: Attention geeks! A few dabs of this specialized grip wax is all you need to keep your spectacles from sliding down your nose once and for all. Simply apply a little of this specially formulated all natural wax to the frame and you’ll be set.

posts.title: Solar Powered Battery Pack Generator
posts.content: Keep your electronic devices going – even if there’s no wall outlet in sight – by plugging them into this solar powered battery pack generator. It features a 500 watt-hour lithium-ion battery that recharges in just 7 hours when placed under direct sunlight.

posts.title: Katana Sword Bookends
posts.content: Keep the home or office as tidy as your dojo with help from these katana sword bookends. These killer bookends provide a decorative and functional way to organize all your martial arts how-to books in an orderly manner as you impale them with this mighty weapon.

posts.title: Floating Card Table
posts.content: With the floating card table you and friends can enjoy a rousing game of poker as you cool off in the middle of the pool. The table features an inflatable bumper that keeps the table afloat while it ensures the water stays out so the playing surface remains dry.

posts.title: Fifty Shades Of Bacon Cookbook
posts.content: Prepare the <del>whips and chains</del> cutting board and spatula as you create the most erotic and delicious meal of your life using the Fifty Shades of Bacon cookbook. Every page contains tantalizing recipes guaranteed to make your mouth water.

posts.title: Portable Sun Shade
posts.content: Keep your gorgeous mug from getting fried by ultraviolet rays while you’re laying out on the beach by placing this portable sun shade over your head. This compact accessory folds out so that your face is shielded from the sun – allowing you to rest or sleep in total comfort.
